articles.content: Classical music drama Tár and Martin McDonaghs The Banshees of Inisherin has won the main prizes at the the London Critics Circle film awards. The former, starring Cate Blanchett as conductor Lydia T… [+2584 chars]

articles.author: Veronica Horwell
articles.title: Paco Rabanne obituary - The Guardian
articles.description: Designer of radical metal and plastic garments, who later became known for his bestselling perfumes
articles.content: The 1966 Paris show of Paco Rabanne, who has died aged 88, was outrageous, and immediately set him together with André Courrèges as a designer of what was thought to be the future but turned out only… [+6131 chars]
